formula: a(n) = 2a(n-1) + a(n-2) + a(n-3) - a(n-4) - a(n-6) (checked up to n = 1000)Conjectured G.f.: (4+2 x+x^2-2 x^3-x^4-2 x^5)/(1-2 x-x^2-x^3+ x^4+x^6)  [From Harvey P. Dale, Mar 12 2011 *)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(4+2 x+x^2-2 x^3-x^4-2 x^5)/ (1-2 x-x^2-x^3+x^4+x^6),{x,0,30}],x] (* using conjectured GF, Harvey P. Dale, Mar 12 2011 *)
crossrefs: See A008776 for definitions of Pisot sequences.
author: _R. K. Guy_
